I'm okay with the PS4 version as long as it doesn't force its changes onto the PC version such as GUI accommodations specifically for consoles (\*cough\* Bethesda \*cough\*) and doesn't take away from PC development as they have stated. I just honestly do not see a market for the game on consoles. KSP is just too complicated for anything but PCs and the un-modded stock game is already bland without any simplifications required for consoles. I could see a well-made, simple mobile version being more successful; I'd love to have some type of KSP to play on my iPad when I'm away from the PC and have nothing to do but sit around (medical emergency in the family is requiring me to spend numerous hours at the hospital lately).
